targets.legendFormat: pending jobs for project with shared runners enabled
pending jobs for project without shared runners enabled

panels.description:
The bigger value for all lines, the better it is.

10s line on level 40% means: less than 40% of jobs was queued in less than 10s. So having 1s line at the level of 100% is what would be the best.
panels.title: Job queue duration histogram

panels.description:
The bigger value for all lines, the better it is.

10s line on level 40% means: less than 40% of jobs was queued in less than 10s. So having 1s line at the level of 100% is what would be the best.

targets.expr:
sum by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_bucket{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project", le="1"}[$__interval])
)
  / 
sum  by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_count{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project"}[$__interval])
)

sum by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_bucket{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project", le="3"}[$__interval])
)
  /
sum by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_count{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project"}[$__interval])
)

sum by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_bucket{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project", le="10"}[$__interval])
)
  /
sum by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_count{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project"}[$__interval])
)

sum by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_bucket{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project", le="30"}[5m])
)
/
sum by (shared_runner, jobs_running_for_project) (
  increase(job_queue_duration_seconds_count{env=~"$gitlab_env", jobs_running_for_project=~"$jobs_running_for_project"}[5m])
)
